title: El Ejecutor
overview: A lone gunman is blamed for the murder of a politician, but two detectives uncover a plot and battle the power behind the crime.

title: Illegal Taxi
overview: Marko is a caring family father trying to earn his living by driving illegal taxi during late nights. Business is good until a policeman in civilian clothes takes a seat. The policeman just happens to know about a robbery earlier the same day and Marko just happens to be sitting in the suspected getaway car from the very same robbery.

title: Loop
overview: A documentary filmmaker follows two homicide detectives as they track down a voyeuristic serial killer.
tagline: Documenting murder was not supposed to be this real.

title: The Interrogation
overview: An accused child molester is brought in for questioning by a hard edged detective, who will get the answers he wants one way or the other.

title: The Reckoning
overview: After having spent many years working as an assassin for the New York Underworld, Chris Richardson decides to leave that life behind her, fed up with the killings and bloodshed. Setting out to begin a new life with her lover, she quickly finds out that once you're in, you never leave.

title: Boa Noite Cinderela
overview: An encounter between a young woman and an older man ends up in an unexpected way.

title: Soldier Girl
overview: A fast-paced and action-packed suspense drama, Soldier Girl follows the implosion of a mid-level drug gang after the boss, Bigg Boy, falls into serious debt. When his girlfriend Julia's life is threatened as a result, Bigg reluctantly agrees to involve the gang in a sinister but lucrative business deal at the prodding of his right-hand man, Anthony. The plan unravels quickly however, when Julia unknowingly becomes involved and sparks a deadly cat-and-mouse game between her and the members of the gang. With time running out, Julia must choose to do the right thing - with the help of some unlikely allies - or be haunted forever by the consequences of her complacency.

title: Subspiral
overview: A young man must chose between fast money or the grind of a basic 9 to 5 in order to provide for an ailing mother and children.

title: Hollow
overview: In the span of a single night, "Hungkag (Hollow) explores the lives of three solitary individuals under the eyes of the city lights. Isa, a convenience store clerk suffers from depression Josemari, struggles with the moral dilemmas of his first murder assignment; and Caloy, a taxi cab driver pushed to his breaking point. Three lives moving towards each other, testing their inner selves until they finally cross each others' path. In a single moment, one decision will affect all three...

The picture reveals the problem of drug addiction in contemporary life. Drug addiction can be resisted by strong character young people while others lose everything: friends, love and life. Metiss is a talented rapper, who managed to overcome drug addiction, but paid high price for it losing the girl he loved. One day, he comes across Linda, a young woman whom he tries to save.

title: Love and Death in Los Angeles
overview: After aborting his last assignment for moral reasons, a contract killer is given a second chance to prove his loyalty. But when he learns his mark is his girlfriend's husband, he finds himself battling the ultimate moral dilemma. With only 72 hours to fulfill the contract, he must find a way to save the innocent, and himself... but not everyone is as innocent as they seem.

title: Without Charity
overview: This is the story of a small Indiana town, a robbery that turned for the worse, the murders of three innocent construction workers, and the trial that followed. It is an account of a young woman named Charity Payne who would become the focal point of a small town's frustration with the criminal justice system. What caused this young woman to become involved in such horrible circumstances? Who were the three victims? What impact did it have on a small rural Indiana town? This film explores the crimes and asks the question: Without Charity, would these crimes have taken place?
tagline: Three murders. One small town girl at the center of it all.

title: The Price
overview: A post-modern "western" film that explores the difference between an outlaw and a criminal. Set in an economically ravaged New York City with no central authority, the story centers around two bandits and a bounty hunter.

title: Gianni Schicchi
overview: A young couple is sunbathing on a beach when a friend of theirs, Gianni Schicchi, shows up. Gianni Schicchi is handsome, Gianni Schicchi is funny, Gianni Schicchi is hot! I'm sick of Gianni Schicchi.

title: Manche Hunde müssen sterben
overview: Dr. Basil Feurchtegott operates an complete stranger on the kitchen table in his vacation home, and suddenly finds himself in a very dangerous situation. However, the doctor hasn't felt so alive for a long time. 'The Man', a contract killer, had just traveled by train across the border to Switzerland. In a high rise building 'The Man' accomplishes his job, but is injured. Beneath a bride the two men meet. Fuerchtegott finds the hurt 'Man', and shortly afterwards operates him. The patient rewards him by granting him a favor. A dark net of mistrust, chance, misunderstandings and ignorance unravels towards a catastrophe. Fuerchtegott resumes his job inconspicuously but guilty in the circle of men in white coats, but one of them is missing...

title: Hobby Farm
overview: An ex-convict finds his conscience impeding on his ability to focus on his grim new assignment in this gritty, low-budget crime thriller from Australia. Upon release from prison, Julian is the new accountant, and placed him in charge of the Hobby House, a place where lonely gangsters go for a little female companionship. But it all starts to fall apart when Julian witnesses the brutalization of the gang's sexual slaves, and realizes he can't be complicit in such abhorrent behavior.
tagline: They are Taken. Sold... Discarded

title: Betrayed
overview: Investigative reporter, James Vance, has disappeared and police suspect his best friend, Roger Waite, of murder.
tagline: Not all secrets stay hidden...

title: Gangs of Tooting Broadway
overview: Tooting Broadway is an urban crime drama set in 2009, whose South London location lends a gritty feel to a fast paced story that highlights a rarely seen gang culture.
tagline: It's not where you live... but how.

title: Immanence
overview: After his brother Seth goes missing Jess must piece together his brother's whereabouts by retracing his steps.
tagline: Jess has a story to tell

title: An obsolete altar
overview: Rape is a social cancer. Women are victimized everywhere. The country is roaring. The intellects are walking with candles. The government pay the allowances to the victim. The oppositions are taking advantage. The process of purgation has been already started. The media get excited with justice. But, what will happen if the victim is not a female? A strip of a bra. A cot of underwear. The wire is the only witness of two suicides. A male! A female! A gender less animal (it!)! Customs! Witchcraft! Expurgation! Government! All these nonsense! Hypnotism.... Death, Death n' death with materials! Murder! Murder! Murder! No rally! No protest! Behave like all three stupid monkeys! Shameless hypocrisies! Go the hell! Piss! Stools! Vomit! False! False! False! Fuck! All these under authorities! Materialized under an obsolete altar!
tagline: What if a victim of a rape is not a female?

title: The Girl Under the Bridge
overview: A black-and-white, stylistic film-noir focusing on a detective trying to solve the strange murder of a young girl.

title: Therapy for Murder
overview: A crime film with comedic overtones, Terapie pentru crimă (Therapy for Murder) follows Matilde, a beginner "professional" assassin who not only has to overcome the problems that every beginner in this unusual profession faces, but also an additional and personal challenge: she's a woman. When Matilde realizes killing for money is not that easy she wants to back out but it may already be too late as a real professional assassin is now after her.
tagline: A beginner hitman has to overcome a great challenge: it's a she.

title: Glæpur og samviska
overview: A drama about some artists living together in an old board school out in the country in Iceland. Some are lucky some are not.

title: The Magic Murderer
overview: While flipping through the newspaper Tom comes across an article that describes the mysterious murders plaguing his city. As he reads more closely and studies the latest crime scene photo, he is horrified by what he discovers.

title: Stay-at-Home Dads
overview: Ned Wazinski, an unemployed vending machine mechanic, and Julian York, a former male stripper, meet on a park bench while watching their kids play. They have very peculiar ways of looking at their children...
tagline: Just be glad you weren't raised by one of these guys...

title: Fresas vs. nacos
overview: Carla's friends think less of her boyfriend, Mauricio, but when a group of criminals wants to kidnap them, Mauricio must confront the bandits.

title: Money Dog
overview: Two Bronx teens steal a pit bull puppy. One boy wants it as a fighting dog, the other as a pet. The conflict ends in heartache, with lessons learned.

title: Amado
overview: Amado runs a cyber café in a dangerous neighborhood. An old acquaintance brings back his criminal past and Amado seeks redemption from the lifestyle he once had.

title: MP2V
overview: MP2V - a rare online video format...is specifically designed for streaming terror. Follow a day-in-the-life of two sociopaths as they travel through small town America on a road trip of terror. WATCH them as they document and film their heinous acts and create a psychotic road diary at each and every unnerving turn. MP2V will take you on a journey unlike any other conventional film. MP2V is a film about serial killers...made by the killers themselves.

title: Nunca regreses
overview: Two friends from the countryside decide to take a job, without measuring the consequences they will have to face. They can't go back to the way they were.

title: Love Never Dies
overview: Based on the short story, 'NONA' by Stephen King, LOVE NEVER DIES is a psychological thriller about a drifter who wanders the night, seeking to escape his tormented past. One night, he meets the mysterious and seductive Nona, a woman cast from his darkest fantasies, who lures him on a deadly chase to uncover the horrifying truth he so desperately wants to avoid. Inspired by the creepy corners of King's imagination, LOVE NEVER DIES explores the razor-thin line that separates the allure of love from the romance of murder. Love never dies...but sometimes it kills!
tagline: ...but sometimes it kills.

title: Die Die My Darling
overview: Archangel may be as feminine and attractive as any stripper, but she is tough enough to pass the Boss's security, and confront him as an angel from hell.

title: Gurushetram – 24 Hours of Anger
overview: This social drama is set in a working class Singaporean Tamil family. With gangsters at his doorstep and drug addicts for parents, 17-year old Prakash struggles to hold his family together and protect his mentally-challenged brother from dangers in and outside the family. When his family is implicated in a crime gone sour, Prakash's resolve and courage are put to the ultimate test.

title: New Blood
overview: Steve is very good at his job. Some might say a little too good. To some others... suspiciously good. The nature of Steve's ascension to corporate glory is riddled ...

title: That Terrible Jazz
overview: Private investigator Sam Sellers reluctantly takes on a favor to find a jazz band's missing saxophone player, before they are to perform at a local nightclub.

title: Under My Nails
overview: A Puerto Rican salon employee is forced to confront her own erotic desires when she becomes obsessed with the violent sexual tendencies of her new neighbors.
tagline: She will find love in the hands of a murderer.

title: Derniers recours
overview: Slimane can't renew his student resident permit. Will he accept the proposal to help his friend Mehdi in his illegal business in exchange for a permanent residency card?

title: Күрүөйэх
overview: The path of the three fellow travelers leaves a trail of blood... Who will survive in the harsh taiga in the struggle for life?

title: Serenade to Miette
overview: A Short heroic film about a street magician, a professional illusionist, and the mafia.

title: This Is Reality
overview: November 2011. Greece collapses financially. Prime Minister Papandreu announces a Referendum initiative on his austerity plan. In the meantime, the life of Stavros, a mobbed up Greek immigrant in New York, is about to change forever.

title: Breaking Santa
overview: Santa goes on a blind date and ends up getting a lesson in Stockholm Syndrome.

title: Real Dreams
overview: Marcela and Minerva tell their boyfriends they have inherited some jewelry from their mother. When a masked man starts following them everywhere, they consult the Ouija board and find out they are actually being stalked by their boyfriends.

title: Saayad
overview: Saayad is the story of two generations living together, but experiencing the world in very different ways.
tagline: Crime, Action

title: Vacation
overview: An unconventional, but intelligent young man, wheels, deals, and steals his way through the modern grind of an urban city, all in pursuit of one thing that will bring him happiness; that is, to escape.

title: Monimondan
overview: An expensive diamond necklace worth Rs. 57,000 gets stolen from Jeweller Roshomoye Sarkar's house by his servant Bholanath the night before its delivery to Delhi. Byomkesh investigates.

title: Frombluetored
overview: Fran has a picture and a goal: to beat up the boy who appears in it.
tagline: Fran is looking for the guy in the picture. He wants to beat him up.

title: Do You Want Ice With That
overview: This is a psychological thriller involving two young men. Barry and Stan are at Barry's house when Barry insists that Stan should add some ice from the icebox to his drink. Stan returns speechless as he finds, wedged in the icebox, two little boys, bound and gagged.

title: Noche de circo
overview: Crime and suspense

title: Excursion
overview: Trapped inside a university library while on a tour, a group of high school students and their teachers attempt to flee from two relentless killers who prowl the corridors.
tagline: Make your move.

title: Girls, Gangsters & Zombies
overview: After a successful robbery, three thieves get notice by some gangsters, while all at the same time accidentally releasing a chemical that brings the dead back to life. They must team up if they want a chance to survive the night.

title: Blood Honour Bleeds
overview: UN statistics say that there are more than 5000 women and girls killed by their own family members for the sake of their honor for reasons like westernizing, falling in love and getting married by their own choice to partners outside their castes and religions, engaging in homosexual acts and a lot more. They happen all over the world. Though there are approximate statistics of the lives lost there are no statistics of people who have spend their lives with the burden of guilt of killing their loved ones for the sake of their family honor.

title: Children's Show
overview: A film based on a real life story of children ages 10-15 years old being used by a syndicate for underground wrestling.

title: Derrick J's Victimless Crime Spree
overview: This moving and amusing story is narrated by Derrick J himself and includes plenty of exciting activist footage that makes it clear who the real criminals are - the people calling themselves "government".

title: The Blocks
overview: The story is set in a block house area, where number of strange events take place. Everybody has something to hide, nobody is innocent. Only a little girl chooses to confront the forces of evil.

title: Against the Sea
overview: Contra El Mar (Against The Sea) is a portrait of a young marriage struggling to find common ground amid hardship and uncertainty.

title: Destiny
overview: A young fighter meddles in a feud between "business associates," soon descending into a criminal underworld that's all too real.

title: 100W Bulb
overview: The film tells the story of Farzin's life (played by Mohsen Tanabandeh) who is addicted to narcotics and is involved with his family throughout the story ...

title: Simon
overview: After agreeing to work as a hitman for a dangerous mafioso, Simon faces a moral dilemma when he rescues a man, who happens to have a shocking story to tell.

title: Frustrated
overview: Constant humiliation from society and a long drift into solitude slowly turn murder fantasies of Fabrice Lombard into an irrepressible impulse and Fabrice Lombard into a serial killer.
tagline: Get under the skin of a serial killer

title: Subdued
overview: Nick Costanzo and his brother must decide what path to pursue in the underground world of the Italian Mafia.  Director David Tittone Writer David Tittone Stars David TittoneGavin FerraraStaci Klinginsmith

title: Never Give up Son
overview: Three ex-criminals living as immigrants in Stockholm, Sweden, attempt to forge new lives for themselves on the right side of the law. However, struggling against a lifetime of reckless behavior, they come to realize that the decision to change must be made every single day, and giving up can never be an option.
tagline: Getting out is only the beginning

title: Die Pfefferkörner - Endspurt
overview: It is a compilation of episodes from season 9. The two parts of the feature film include episodes 105-117.

title: Suicide and Murder
overview: A potential suicide attends psychotherapy only to discover that it is too late to prevent his own death and, incidentally, a murder for which he will also be responsible.

title: The Fall of a Cutter's Mind
overview: Within the depths of a dying city, an Insomniac Cutter has been fired from his job.
tagline: One story. One moment. This moment.

title: Hard Strings
overview: Harde Strenger is about  Bobby, Alex and HK who on day are indebted to the village no.1 asshole "Slegga". Everyone has a way to raise money, these guys have many.  Harde Strenger offers ridiculous situations, dry jokes, action-packed scenes, romantic moments, "råning" and folk music.

title: This Killing Business
overview: Climb inside the mind of a sociopath; an office worker kills his way into management but gets into trouble with his talkative girlfriend and a corrupt detective. Jim Collins has decided to kill his way to the top. He begins by strangling Harry, his manager, one night on an abandoned highway. Complications emerge when, at Harry's wake, Jim learns Gail, his girlfriend, had slept with Harry months ago. Being interrogated by the intimidating detective Scott Hume doesn't help things either. Jim's psychosis kicks into high gear when he decides that Gail, who knows that Jim killed Harry and is going to tell the cop, has to be terminated.
tagline: Moving Up Is Murder.

title: No Name: The Fastest Knitter in the West
overview: In post-Civil War Bexar County, Texans live in abject poverty, forcing folks to make ends meet by any means necessary. No one messes with No Name Somethin'-or-Other.
tagline: Hard times force some people to... get creative.

title: Bullseye
overview: It's the year 1935 and Private Detective Dick Polakowski has recently bankrupted Charlie's Casino, the city's headquarters of organized crime. Charlie Rodriguez and the Charlie Brothers ran every facet of the town including having the government officials on their payroll. Their word was law. Dick left the Charlie Brothers with nothing. With crime vanquished, Dick plans his retirement until he gets a phone call from Marcus Rodriguez, Charlie's #2. Dick's wife and daughter have been kidnapped. It's the money or his family's lives.

title: Chifumi
overview: Are you ready to die for love? It's a question often asked between the lovers.A serial killer is looking for young couples in the 'most romantic city':Paris. And give them a chance to prove this question by a simple game: Rock-Paper-Scissors.

title: Norte Sin Horizonte
overview: The story of the American dream of all those who leave their country for a better future.
tagline: No te agüites mija, ya me conoces.

title: Five Pounds
overview: After discovering a duffle bag full of marijuana, Alex, a 20 something year old college student, decides to take advantage of what has fallen into his hands. Alex soon sees how thrilling and easy selling drugs can be but is not aware of the harm he is causing to himself and others, especially to the rightful owner. Unknown to Alex, Ben, the young drug dealer who stashed the bag, is now in a world of trouble and is looking for him and the bag.

title: Recoil
overview: When Ryan's girlfriend is brutally murdered he begins to psychologically unravel, falling into a dangerous criminal underworld where memories are skewed and he must ultimately question his own humanity.

title: Gunther P. Gunnings
overview: Gunther P Gunnings is  the top detective in the LAPD. He lost everything and everyone he cared about when he chose work over his woman. Can he get it all back or will Eduardo Destructo hatch up a new plan that will cause Gunther to continue to choose work?  He fights crime by day and makes love to sexy ass ladies by night.
tagline: He fights crime by day and makes love to sexy ass ladies by night.

title: Assassin Report
overview: Three journalism students decide to follow the steps of the "Montblanc Monster", an assassin who killed 17 girls and hasn't been found yet by the police, and record everything to make a report as their final year project.
tagline: Hold Your Breath. Don't Stop Recording. Finish the Report.

title: Defrayment
overview: A young hitman is put through the motions in being part of "the business" and a simple trip to reclaim a lost grimoire introduces him to a world of pain, where nothing is what it seems and where he too, has a price to pay.
tagline: EVERYTHING HAS A PRICE

title: S de Sofia
overview: Sofia, a extremely mysterious and attractive girl, seduces Bianca to take her to her own place in a night of love. However, Sofia has much more dangerous intentions than Bianca can imagine.

title: Four Stories of St. Julian
overview: Set entirely in one location, the film follows four strangers who become trapped in the elevator of St. Julian-a decrepit, inner-city building. An assassin, a religious zealot, a mother, and a thief...just moments after being confined, it becomes clear that one of them is mortally wounded. As the minutes tick by, a battle for survival ensues where each of them is forced to examine their sordid ties to St. Julian-the building, as well as the legacy of the religious figure.

title: Barrio Brawler
overview: A martial arts instructor must enter the world of illegal pit fighting in order to save his family and his dojo.
tagline: They forced him to fight. Big mistake.

title: VICE News: The Islamic State
overview: The Islamic State, a hardline Sunni jihadist group that formerly had ties to al Qaeda, has conquered large swathes of Iraq and Syria. Previously known as the Islamic State of Iraq and Syria (ISIS), the group has announced its intention to reestablish the caliphate and has declared its leader, the shadowy Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, as the caliph. The lightning advances the Islamic State made across Syria and Iraq in June shocked the world. But it's not just the group's military victories that have garnered attention - it's also the pace with which its members have begun to carve out a viable state. Flush with cash and US weapons seized during its advances in Iraq, the Islamic State's expansion shows no sign of slowing down. In the first week of August alone, Islamic State fighters have taken over new areas in northern Iraq, encroaching on Kurdish territory and sending Christians and other minorities fleeing as reports of massacres emerged.  —VICE News

title: Confessions of the Boston Strangler
overview: This two-hour documentary special for Investigation Discovery sends viewers back to a time when no woman in Boston felt safe. The city finally felt a sigh of relief when, in a recorded confession, Albert DeSalvo admitted to his savage rampage and the first known serial killer in America was put behind bars. But decades later, compelling DNA analysis revealed that DeSalvo may not in fact have committed the crimes.

title: Tubelight's Moon
overview: A boy, eking out a living on Kolkata's streets, falls one day in love with the Moon. This is the story of how he woos her.

title: Hotel Fortuna
overview: A fatigued hitman checks into a very unusual hotel.

title: Sheriff Banana
overview: A sheriff is forced to relocate while resolving a land dispute. This is among nine films commissioned by Thailand's King Bhumibol Adulyadej for the 2012 Terdglao Project.

title: Sadourni's Butterflies
overview: A circus dwarf, imprisoned for a crime of passion, seeks a release from both his incarceration and his diminutive body while wooing a porn actress.

title: Phone Police
overview: When the New York Phone Police department is shut down, Wheels and his team (Detective Domestic Jackson and Freddie Hicerstein) must find somewhere new to dish out their own form of cellular telephone motor car related justice.
tagline: Hanging up on Crime

title: Until Your Death Do Us Part
overview: Arturo's cousin calls him to let him now that his wife is having an affair, and she is planning to kill him.

title: Paranoia Park
overview: A woman argues with her daughter in the park, few minutes later, the daughter is held captive by a maniac, The mother has to execute insane actions for the next sixty minutes if she wants to see again her daughter.
tagline: She have one hour to save her daughter, not one minute more...

title: Adivino
overview: A horror story about a fortune teller who used to betray all her clients then eventually haunt her down...
